title: STAT+: At JPM 2026, Mehmet Oz and top Trump health officials explain their thinking to hospital leaders
description: Oz downplayed the effects of cuts to Medicaid and defended RFK Jr.'s moves on vaccines.
content: Oz downplayed the effects of cuts to Medicaid and defended RFK Jr.'s moves on vaccines.
